short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Very simple, no frills extension that removes RTs, likes, trends and various other spam content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension that will remove all retweets, likes, the trend panel, the follower recommendation panel and other kinds of spam from the Twitter website. It comes with no settings, no icons and is very simple, very low-key.

This was created as I could not find any extension that works with the current version (2020) of Twitter.
